level.heading: Service under other laws and rules of court.
level.text: This chapter does not limit or affect the right to serve process in any other manner now or hereafter required or permitted by:
other law, including Chapter 4 of this title or, any other provisions of this Code; or

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Attachment and garnishment proceedings, service of process in proceedings, see § 16-502.
Corporations, service of process upon, see § 29-612.
Insurance companies, service of process upon, see §§ 31-4323 and 31-2502.23.
